data.gachaDesc: Take part in the Chase Concerto to obtain Lucky Draw Tickets and win prizes!
data.gachaHelp:
About Resetting:
After consuming a Lucky Draw Ticket and obtaining the Premium Prize from the prize pool, you can choose to reset the reward list.
Upon resetting the chosen prize pool, it will switch to a new prize pool, and the rewards in the current prize pool will no longer be obtainable. 
Once you've reset to the fifth prize pool, you can only reset again after obtaining all the rewards on the list.
